public class BHLinkedList<E>
extends java.lang.Object

The BHLinkedList class recreates java's LinkedList class

Author:
Brian Hauck

          Counts until one before the node oyu want to remove, then grabs the reference from the to-be cut node and pastes it into the node before it.

Constructor Detail

BHLinkedList

public BHLinkedList()
Initial Constructor for the whole linked list. Creates a size tracker starting at 0. Creates the head node that treacks the first node/ Sets the current operable node to head.

Method Detail

addInFront

public void addInFront(E data)
The opposite of removeFromFront. Creates a new node, sets the next field on it to the Head's nextNode value, then sets the Head's nextNode to the new node.

Parameters:
Generic - Object

addNode

public void addNode(E data)
Adds a node at the end of the list. Sets previous end of the list's nextNode() value to the new one.

Parameters:
Generic - Object

addNode

public void addNode(int i,
                    E data)
Adds a node at a specified location. Creates new node, counts until one before the new location, points the current node towards the new one, then points the new one at the previous current.getNext()

Parameters:
Index - to insert at, Generic Object

printArray

public void printArray()
Uses the overridden toString() method to print each Node's data.

remove

public void remove(int i)
Counts until one before the node oyu want to remove, then grabs the reference from the to-be cut node and pastes it into the node before it.

Parameters:
Index - to remove

removeFromFront

public void removeFromFront()
Removes the first node by moving to the second node, then setting that one to the head's first node tracker.

Size
